favourite.article: Can someone post the Spanish lyrics or send it to me at least?

Good Evening, Lord Jesus! Thank You Lord for leading me today, I really am touched by Your appearance to me today Lord Jesus. Whatever happens, You are always by my side, but Lord, I always turn away from You. Lord forgive me. Lord Jesus, I turn to You at the end of the day. Lord You give me a new beginning. Let me stand behind You, Lord! Lord, I love You, kiss me Lord!
O Lord Jesus we love YOU!
Lord, thank You that Your love sees beyond my wrongs and You're always in the position to forgive me. Thank You Lord for loving me so much.

How sweet Your love it is! What a deep and wide Your love it is!
Although, I call the name of the Jesus, and do pray-reading almost everyday. Although, I have been being with You a little long time.
Lord Jesus! Last year, I have losted myself in somewhere place. Frankly speaking, I have not known where I am.
I am so sorry, Lord Jesus, because I am a fallen man, so I have clearly forgotten Your precious love so many times.
Doing many things not touching Your love. Oh! Lord Jesus, I return to You from whole my being.
Lord Jesus! Really need You! Your love is more better that any other things on the earth.
This song reminds me that I am as that woman, sinful and yet He has forgiven me allows me to touch Him. I pray that I would hold nothing back but truely waste my life, my all on Him.

This song leads me to touch my spirit. I love You Jesus, I love You. May I waste my all and life on You. Let me pour the ointment pure, on Your head and on Your feet on You PRECIOUS ONE BECAUSE I LOVE YOU. May the Lord daily reveal Himself to us and grant us such an experience like Mary that we will waste ourselves on our precious One.
Oh Lord, let me stand behind You. I just love You! Lord, keep my heart always true to You!
I enjoy the hymns. They remind me to come closer to the Lord.

Verse 3 reminds us that we are sinners that touched the Lord. We are like the woman not worthy to anoint the Lord. But the Lord, knowing who we are, allowed us to touch Him and anoint Him! What a privilege to pour ourselves on Him! Our consecration is not a boast or some kind of extraordinary sacrifice. It is our reasonable reaction to His love toward us. Saints, we are so honored that we can give our all to Him!

Every time I recall this testimony of Mary of Bethany, it touches me deeply. She took opportunity to "waste" herself on the Lord and anoint the Lord properly before His burial because she sat at the Lord's feet and listened to His word. Lord make me love You and treasure You more than anything else!

As I listen to this hymn, I couldn't help but touch the Lord in my spirit... I want to embrace Him because of what He has done to save a sinner like me.... How wonderful if all the sisters would love the Lord and pour out all they have just like what Mary had done!
God forgave us the most, so all we can do is to love Him the most. When we see the preciousness of Jesus, we like Mary would "waste" our all on Him.

This song really touches me, especially in 3rd pharagraph..I am only a sinner but He forgave me the most now I really love You Lord, cause me Lord of loving You more each day..and for me to stand behind You...

Lord, I really want to pour my all on You!! Cause me Lord that each day will be a moment of loving you, an opportunity to pour my everything on You, and a chance to anoint You with my entire being!!
Hallelujah!!
I love this song its really touching and meaningful.. I hope all the saints out there will hear this hymn it'll move u to tears... God bless u all
I know that i don't suit the Lord, and i know that what i pour on the Lord is nothing precious, plus, also it comes from such a sinner like me..but i love You Jesus, my Master, i love You.
When I first listened to this song, I find it is diffcult to sing. But now I love this song very much! It's because the melody and the lyrics are great! Lord, let me stand behind You.
This song touches me very much! I like it!
